# MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle.CalloutStyle

**Structure**

The style to use for callout content.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CalloutStyle
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle/CalloutStyle/full] style works for map views on iPadOS and macOS. Use sheet presentation to display full detail place information on iOS.

## Type Properties

- **automatic**: A value that allows the framework to choose an appropriate callout style automatically.
- **compact**: A compact, space-saving callout style.
- **full**: A rich, detailed callout style that is suitable for large map views.

## Callout styles

- **automatic**: A value that allows the framework to choose an appropriate callout style automatically.
- **compact**: A compact, space-saving callout style.
- **full**: A rich, detailed callout style that is suitable for large map views.
